title: Spliced
description: In a world where clones are created and sold as commodities, Matt Muldane can't resist purchasing an intriguing slave.Status: In progress/IncompleteLast update: 04/29/2013Word count: approx. 250,000 Author Note (Aug-2-2013): Still working heavily on the story, including some rewrites as well as continuing it. I'm just updating more slowly due to real life constraints, etc. Thanks for your patience.
author: flighty_dreams
